Help System

Menu for the XCL12 Package

Menu for the XCL12 Package

  • compass - Draw north and east arrows.
  • disconlab - Display image and overlay contours and coordinates.
  • dsimg - Save the image display buffer to an image.
  • hltorgb - Transform brightness and hue to red, green, and blue.
  • im2gki - Send an image to a IRAF GIO graphics device.
  • imdisp_pos - Determine image location in image display.
  • mosaic_display - Display many images in a single image display buffer.
  • overlap - Overlap two images by a certain amount of lines or columns.
  • pltcmap - Plot a color map image.
  • rashead - Show rasterfile header information.
  • rastoim - Convert rasterfile to IRAF image.
  • saodump - Make image and colormap files from SAOimage display.
  • scmapc - Reformat SAOimage colormap for Celco.

  • (Type "help sdisplay opt=sys" for more information about the 'sdisplay' package).
